summary: The Spanish Civil War, as experienced by the town of Villa Ramiro. The local count and his Fascist nephews ally with the rebels; the count's son, indifferent to politics at the outset, ... See full summary »
cast: Mariangela Melato|Ron Faber|Cosimo Cinieri|Rocco Fontana|Franco Ressel|Mario Novelli|Cirylle Spiga|Diego Bardon|Adriano Cornelli|Luigi D'Ecclesia|Domenico Imperato|Franco Doria|Salvatore Furnari|Bento Urago|Antonio Epifania|Francesco Giordano|Salvator Tamborino|Michele Epifania|Raffaele Epifania|Anthony Clavette|Jose-Antonio Caceres|Germaine Levi
title: El árbol de Guernica
